title: ðŸš¨ Rob Gronkowski traded to Bucs in return to NFL, reunion with Tom Brady - Emergency Podcast (Football 4/21)
description:
Rob Gronkowski is making his return to the NFL...and not with the New England Patriots. Join Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough as they immediately react to Gronk being traded to the Buccaneers for a reunion with Tom Brady. The Pick Six Superfriends discuss the compensation the Pats received, what the move signals about Gronk's willingness to play for Bill Belichick, what the future Hall of Fame tight end still has left and Tampa Bay's status as a contender in the year the city is slated to host the Super Bowl.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
